sorcer.service

Interface Mappable<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncExertion, Context<T>, Exertion, InclusiveContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, AltExertion, AntTask, ArrayContext, Block, ComprehensiveContext, ContextResult, ContextTask, ControlContext, EvaluationTask, Job, ListContext, LoopExertion, NetBlock, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectBlock, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, OptExertion, Par, ParImpl, ParModel, PositionalContext, ServiceContext, ServiceExertion, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext, SignedServiceTask, Task

    public interface Mappable<T>
extends Identifiable
    Implicit Maps such that a path indicates internal structure of composition with the last inner component indicated by the path. Contexts, Exertions, Vars are examples of mappables.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T asis(String path)
      Returns a value at the path as is with no reevaluation.
      T getValue(String path, Arg... args)
      Returns a value at the path.
      T putValue(String path, Object value)
      Maps the specified path to the specified value in this mappable.

      • Methods inherited from interface sorcer.service.Identifiable

        getId, getName

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        T getValue(String path,
         Arg... args)
           throws ContextException
        Returns a value at the path.
        Parameters:
        path - the attribute-based path
        Returns:
        this mappable value
        Throws:
        ContextException

      • asis

        T asis(String path)
       throws ContextException
        Returns a value at the path as is with no reevaluation.
        Parameters:
        path - the attribute-based path
        Returns:
        this mappable value with no reevaluation
        Throws:
        ContextException

      • putValue

        T putValue(String path,
         Object value)
           throws ContextException
        Maps the specified path to the specified value in this mappable. Neither the path nor the value can be null.

        The value can be retrieved by calling the getValue method with a path that is equal to the original path.

        Parameters:
        path - the attribute-based path
        value - the new value
        Returns:
        the previous value of the specified path in this mappable, or null if it did not have one
        Throws:
        ContextException
